name: Aufpassen
description:
Welcome to Aufpassen manor, Germany. The year is 1988 and this house was once home to a happy family but now something else calls this property and keeps a close watch from the shadows, but something isn't quite right here...

Use the to-do list left on your person to help you escape this mysterious place, and uncover the secrets within through scattered letters.

-----------------------------------------------------

Hi everyone!

This is the second game I've made for college, and is my final project for my second year at college. I will be studying programming at University very soon and I'm very excided to start uploading more projects from that!

I hope you enjoy it as its been a lot of fun to work on and develop. I've learnt so much about programming and game development from this project and I cant wait to learn more so I can make even better games in the future! 

-----------------------------------------------------

Feedback is always appreciated :)
